# DID/VC Integration Architecture

## Overview

This document outlines the integration of Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs) and Verifiable Credentials (VCs) into the Symbi Trust Protocol, enabling sovereign identity management and cryptographic proof-of-control mechanisms.

## Core Components

### 1. Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs)

#### DID Methods Supported
- **did:web** - Web-based DIDs for organizations with existing domains
- **did:key** - Simple cryptographic key-based DIDs
- **did:ethr** - Ethereum-based DIDs for blockchain integration
- **did:ion** - Bitcoin-anchored DIDs via Microsoft ION

#### DID Document Structure
```json
{
  "@context": [
    "https://www.w3.org/ns/did/v1",
    "https://w3id.org/security/suites/ed25519-2020/v1"
  ],
  "id": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:agent-123",
  "verificationMethod": [{
    "id": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:agent-123#key-1",
    "type": "Ed25519VerificationKey2020",
    "controller": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:agent-123",
    "publicKeyMultibase": "z6MkhaXgBZDvotDkL5257faiztiGiC2QtKLGpbnnEGta2doK"
  }],
  "authentication": ["#key-1"],
  "assertionMethod": ["#key-1"],
  "service": [{
    "id": "#symbi-trust-endpoint",
    "type": "SymbiTrustProtocol",
    "serviceEndpoint": "https://api.symbi.trust/v1/trust"
  }]
}
```

### 2. Verifiable Credentials (VCs)

#### Trust Declaration Credential
```json
{
  "@context": [
    "https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1",
    "https://symbi.trust/contexts/trust/v1"
  ],
  "type": ["VerifiableCredential", "TrustDeclarationCredential"],
  "issuer": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:issuer-456",
  "issuanceDate": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "expirationDate": "2024-07-15T10:30:00Z",
  "credentialSubject": {
    "id": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:subject-789",
    "trustDeclaration": {
      "targetAgent": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:target-101",
      "trustLevel": 0.85,
      "context": "financial_transactions",
      "evidence": {
        "interactionCount": 47,
        "successRate": 0.96,
        "timeframe": "P6M"
      }
    }
  },
  "proof": {
    "type": "Ed25519Signature2020",
    "created": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "verificationMethod": "did:web:symbi.trust:agents:issuer-456#key-1",
    "proofPurpose": "assertionMethod",
    "proofValue": "
